description: The station has been declared as closed by the responsible supervising organization.
name: Closed

description: The station is considered non-operational/non-reporting temporarily, but is expected to resume its operations/reporting after the temporary suspension.
name: Non-reporting

description: The station fully complies with the reporting obligations of the observation programme/network concerned.
name: Operational

description: The station partially complies with the reporting obligations of the observation programme/network concerned.
name: Partly operational

description: The station is planned to be deployed sometime in the future, and all information provided is indicative only. No observations are taken.
name: Planned

description: The station is deployed and producing data but still not fully ready to start reporting operationally.
name: Pre-operational

description: The declared operating status of this particular station/platform is unknown.
name: unknown
